Blog.post: Well... last night i stayed up and chat with Sharon till like 4 30am or something like that... then my cousin came home and we drank a few beers... Slept at abt 6am then woke up at 12pm for Dim Sum with my sister and Derrick...after that went to do some grocery shopping with my sis... Came home , chat with Sharon again then i called her and her mum found out...DAMN!!! Now i can't call anymore and dunno if i can still chat with her a not... SHIT MAN!!! Y MUST IT ALWAYS BE THIS WAY!!! ARRGH!!! Well will be staying up again with Sharon later and tml i'll be studying for my maths test on tuesday... and my dad is coming soon... so screwed... he got my report and he ain't happy man... got D's for my maths and econs and b+'s and A's for the rest... and i haven't clear up my room yet man... shit... Sharon... i hope u will be able to do something abt the toking and chattin... Go tok to ur mum and tell her the truth or something la... if not then try to work something out can??? Well... i LOVE u... sigh...

Well today i woke up late... missed econs and half of accounts... lucky both Simone and Nigel ain't pissed... then took computing test today...lucky i could still remember some stuff man... think i will pass la... Then after college , i went to the city to meet my sis and Derrick then we went to the Uni to buy some stuff... and i bought some dvds to kill time...cuz i'm still FUCKING GROUNDED.... Anyways... now that i have so much time... it sucks man...i miss home(SINGAPORE) , my family , my MEMBERZ , Sharon... damn... wish i could jus slack wit them and shit like that... didn't appreciate the time i had with them... kinda regretting it now... well there's nothing much to say la... jus that i'm pissed , tired , sleepy and sick...

Well...i will do jus a short one cuz i'm really FUCKING PISSED OFF!!! My dad was willing to let me go... but guess wat??? My Sis said that i was gonna drink again and gave me a fucking long lecture... i mean like wat the fuck... she thinks she is all miss perfect and shit... FUCK... i'm so PISSED!!!aRRGh!!! aLL i can say is... life sux.. fuck it and it ain't fun being me... but thank god i got a supportive girlfriend... love u loads dear...

Today is so damn weird...i didn't sleep last night... had to finish my L&C assignment and play CS ...haha... and Johnny called me at 2am to tell me Rohan found my wallet... So damn happy!! YEAH!!! haha... well today i had L&C , break then maths...and i was so damn sleepy...i slept during Jeanette's class and i hope she didn't see me... L&C is DAMN FREAKIN BORING MAN!!! Well anyways... Ian was acting strange today... kept asking me to look at "perfect gal" and "roxy gal" i mean like i admit they r good looking but we dun even know their names...so y the hell we keep looking at them??? i dunno Ian la... he was like toking abt them the whole damn day.... During break , me and ian went to chinatown to eat... was so damn full...i felt like i was pregnant !!! and it was so cold today... and then maths... the freaking hated subject with FUCKING BASTARD SON OF A BITCH Wayne Morgan....!!! we r still doin matrix and it was ok la... jus that i kept falling asleep..haha!!!Oh ya... B4 maths Janice was with us(me , ian , sumihiro and hiro ) and we were like toking abt PMS... it was so weird and making fun of Hiro's strawberry yogurt...haha... but it didn't affect him...damn!!!And we heard that JENNY DICKSON might be teaching us maths... we r all so gonna die...ESP mE!!! aRRgH!!! I hope its not true man... She will freaking skin me alive for all the assignment i didn't do... And after college , went to Hindley St to meet up with Tush , Rohan and Johnny ...Jackie said she was coming but she didn't come... DAMN JACKIE!!!! Anyways... they passed me my wallet and i was so close to crying man... i missed it so much... and then we felt so stupid toking to the police officer ...explaining our situation...haha... then i left... Took the T500 home... Well came home, saw my cousin Matthew and we were like so happy that i found my wallet...haha then i called my DAD... and told him that i found my wallet and asked abt tml...And he say "SEE HOW LAH...CALL ME TML THEN SAY" hahaha...YEAH!!! so that means most probably yes already....hahaha... Takuji's home... here i come... yea!!!Wat would really make this day really a good one would be chatting with Sharon... i miss her so much... damn... and for all those who dunno...YES..IT IS TRUE... I AM BACK WITH SHARON AND WE R STILL IN LOVE!!! hahaha... going crazy already la... well... i tired already and Simpsons is on...So i GTG...

Well...after the stupid test , me,Chandru , Alex , Takuji and Hiro went to eat at the pizza place again... had lamb curry... damn its good... and i'm still grounded for getting drunk and losing my wallet...Shit... i mean like , i didn't want to lose my wallet wad... knnz... haiz... well wat can i do??? And on Friday , everyone is going to Takuji's place for some party... i hope i can go... Gotta ask my dad first ...Shit la... and now Sharon is pissed with me for saying something stupid and like... i didn't mean to... but ...i dunno la... feel so down...Damn... Sharon... pls dun be mad... i didn't mean it... i was in a bad mood... pls babe... i love u... Well... i hope all goes well and i can go on Firday...PLS GOD...I REALLY WANNA GO!!!

Damn...still in college... so bored jus did my stupid aust studies test... and guess wat>>>??? it was EASY ...YEAH!!! anyways... will update this later...scared teacher catch sial... must pay money one leh... hahaha...
Well... i jus got an account today... and i hope my frenz and memberz would look at it... anyways... school sux today... it sux!!!
urlLink Damn...haha... took this for fun... was kinda bored urlLink

Well today woke up jus in time to catch the fucking bus... so damn tired... anyways... after class i went to have curry with chandru and alex and we were jus toking crap and then took to T500 home... well i have been doing some thinking... and i might not deal... fuck wat i said in my previous post... Thanks ah Bos and Leo... it really ain't worth it... thanks for reminding me... miss all of u guys man... MeMbErZ fOr LiFe...!!! And sharon... pls try to understand...sigh...love u...

Today i woke up at 1pm and i did manage to study and complete most of my assignments... and then i jus watch some videos and dvds... cook something up for myself and thats it... then came online and saw sharon online... ask her wats up and she says she has been goin out having fun and shit then fucking goin for sleepover and shit...the worst thing is that she goes out with some motherfucker by the name toby and shit...she says she is acting /speaking like him and shit... fuck him man... i will whoop that MOTHERFUCKING PUNK ASS SON OF A BITCH... then i ask her to call me and she dun wanna... wat the fuck... i mean like i haven't spoke to her for a while and when i wanna call , she jus trip and fucking dun wanna.... fuck... then i called her and we were toking and shit... but fuck she had some fucked up attitude.... and she said at least she called once... wat the fuck... she wans a fucking prize or something... this is bullshit man... fuck... i can't fucking stand all this shit... she say she loves me and miss me and shit like that but she dun wan no contact... that is some fucked up shit... and i jus found out that johnny can hook me up with some joints so ya... i dunno if i wan it... i know i said i won't deal and shit but with all this shit... i dunno man... fuck... this is fucking bullshit... she jus thinks its all a fucking joke... and ppl who read this esp guys... u tell me how the fuck u would feel if ur gf say and do shit like that man... give ur man here some support and shit... and there is more... she said i am mad at watever she tries to do... but i'm mad cuz she dun do shit at all... wat the fuck... ain't life a motherfucker... wat am i to do man... with this situation and do i deal with joints or dun deal... i have until friday to think if i deal or not... fuck... i dunno wat the fuck is going on anymore man... i dunno y u doin this to me and shit... but if u think its fun then fuck all this man... i mean like i love u and miss u like crazy...but i did so much for us and u ain't doin shit... thats wat i'm mad abt... and if i'm so not important to u... then fucking tell me... shit man... fucking me up like that isn't very fun for me ok... damn...

Well today is ok i guess... i jus promised myself to not use my home internet for at least 1 week cuz i gotta catch up on my studies...so ya... now i'm in college...so sian... jus got my accounting and computing test marks... i got 80% for accounts and 76% for computing..haha...not bad for a computer idiot rite??? hahaha... now got computing class man... so sian... i now jus realised that sharon is actually really concerned abt my studies and she really wants me to do well... i'm so touched...damn...if only i didn't fight with her... haiz...well baby... i love u... will chat with u soon k??? will write up to here... will update this soon....

Today my mum and dad jus went back... damn... didn't spend enough time with them cuz i had so many asiignments... oh... and my dad knows i smoke now and he is cool with it... he told me to not let anyone i know in Aust catch me smoking...haha...well today i was late for Clr thinking and logic class then watch some movie in Aust studies.... rather boring la... then i went to the city with Takuji , Alex , Chandru, Hiro and Sumihiro to have lunch , had lamb curry... then i left them and went to meet my cousin ,Rebacca and we walked around and went shopping... after that we met up with my sis , Derrick and my cousin Matthew... went to have dinner and then my sis had to leave for some badminton thing... so me and both of my cousins went to shoot some pool and get a couple of drinks and go home... ya... thats abt it...will update tml or something KEEP UR WORD!!!

Today i woke up at 12 30pm and like went to college cuz class starts at 01 15pm then after college... my dad came to pick me up and send me to the place to hand in my eye check and take my photo for my License for drving... will receive in a week time...YEAH!!! haha then after that went home to sleep for a while then we went for dinner at some Argentinian restuarant... was so damn full man... haha... then came back and clean up my room... ai yoh... damn sian man... tonite not gonna sleep... gotta do assignment for Jenny Dickson... fuck man... ai... mum and dad r gonna leave soon... shit la... i wanna spend more time with them... damn it... well wat can i do...??ai... think thats abt it... sian man... Love u baby... wooo!!!

Ai... well all is good i guess... today i woke up and went to Gougher Palace for "Dim Sum"... then afetr that i left them and went to Rundal Mall to do my eye check for my "L" license then wen to the stupid place to apply for my card but found out it was close... damn... i walked so much man... After that i went to central market to meet my parents and my sis and my cousin... then we bought some stuff and then went to rundal again...Bought this white tight fit turtleneck long sleve t shirt... and a pair of leather shoes... haha... Yea... can spend when my dad is here man... hahaha.... at abt five... we all went home then we slept for a while and went to uncle ken's place for dinner... was so damn full... haha...oh ya, my dad kept toking to me abt getting a car today... YEAH!!! he said he might get me either a MINI-COOPER , MAZDA 6 , MAZDA RX8 , MAZDA MX5, NISSAN 350Z or PORCHE... i was like damn... but i have to wait 6 months man... hahaha can't wait to get a car... haha... THANKS PA!!!! LOVE U SHARON....

Well the past few days has been shit man... firstly , in college , JENNY DICKSON has officially taken over our class for maths and i am officially fucked...secondly , my mum and dad r here and its fucked man... they r like watching me 24/7 ... and thirdly... Sharon and i have been arguing... damn... but now we r ok la... and oh ya... i pass my LEARNERS theory test... i got my "L" LICENSE... WooOOO.. YEEAAHHH!!!! haha...
urlLink HAPPY 1 YEAR ANNIVERSARY....Love ya always... urlLink

Aiya... well got back my maths test... was pretty screwed up... anyways... after that i got back my Aust studies test... got 60+% so it was ok la... now i'm waiting for my baby girl to come online... oh ya... jus have to say it again... it's our aniversary...hahaha... love u dear...

Today is jus so screwed up!!! i got back my test for maths and i got 9.3 out of 20... fuck la... i stayed up and studied for it leh... dumb test... was actually easy but made it seem so complicated... wat the hell... anyways... i only slept for an hour yesterday frm 5am to 6am... was chatting with Sharon as well... and today is our ANIVERSARY...YEAH!!!! will update later la... still in college Dear... jus wan u to know i love u... miss u tons too...!!!

Well... i didn't sleep yesterday and i'm not goning to today as well... cuz i've jus slept for an hour or so... Stayed up with Sharon yesterday and then studied for Maths...and i think i might be able to do well la...hahaha... Anyways.... today was jus rather boring la... as usual... hai... well ian was late for college today... and i was like falling asleep almost every lesson... hai... And like its my one year anniversary with Sharon today... YEAH!!! i love u baby... miss u too...* hugs and kisses*
urlLink This one was taken when we were at changi airport... ahaha... not bad la... look quite terror urlLink

Well... suppose to go church today but i woke up too late... had a few drinks last night and was thinking abt stuff and i'm kinda scared and pissed at the same time... abt so many things... Anyways... i woke up and eat then went to sleep again and then my sis came home and we went to neighbour's house cuz it was someone's birthday... i went there and played with their cats ... they were so cute... they licked my hand man... well today really sux.. so damn boring....
